mascotDialog.title: A bit lost?
mascotDialog.message:
Here is a mix of handy services! Between INSA and students services, I am sure you will find something for you.

And if you have an Amicale account, you will have even more choices!

proxiwash.title: Proxiwash
proxiwash.washerProcedure:
Put your laundry in the tumble without tamping it and by respecting charge limits.

Close the machine's door.

Choose a program using one of the four favorite program buttons.

Pay to the command central, then press the START button on the machine.

When the program is finished, the screen indicates 'Programme terminé', press the yellow button to open the lid and retrieve your laundry.
proxiwash.washerTips:
Program 'blanc/couleur': 6kg of dry laundry (cotton linen, linen, underwear, sheets, jeans, towels).

Program 'non repassable': 3,5 kg of dry laundry (synthetic fibre linen, cotton and polyester mixed).

Program 'fin 30°C': 2,5 kg of dry laundry (delicate linen in synthetic fibres).

Program 'laine 30°C': 2,5 kg of dry laundry (wool textiles).
proxiwash.dryerProcedure:
Put your laundry in the tumble without tamping it and by respecting charge limits.

Close the machine's door.

Choose a program using one of the four favorite program buttons.

Pay to the command central, then press the START button on the machine.
proxiwash.dryerTips: The advised dryer length is 35 minutes for 14 kg of laundry. You can choose a shorter length if the dryer is not fully charged.

washinsa.title: INSA laundromat
washinsa.subtitle: Your favorite laundromat!!
washinsa.description: This is the washing service for INSA's residences (We don't mind if you do not live on the campus and do your laundry here). The room is right next to the R2, with 3 dryers and 9 washers. It is open 7d/7 24h/24! You can bring your own detergent, use the one given on site or buy it at the Proximo (cheaper than the one given by the machines).
washinsa.tariff:
Washers 6kg: 3€ the washer + 0.80€ with detergent.
Dryers 14kg: 0.35€ for 5min of dryer usage.
washinsa.paymentMethods:
Cash up until 10€.
Credit Card also accepted.

tripodeB.title: Tripode B laundromat
tripodeB.subtitle: For those who live near the metro.
tripodeB.description: This is the washing service for Tripode B and C residences, as well as Thalès and Pythagore. The room is at the foot of Tripod B in front of the Pythagore residence, with 2 dryers and 6 washers. It is open 7d/7 from 7am to 11pm. In addition to the 6kg washers there is one 10kg washer.
tripodeB.tariff:
Washers 6kg: 2.60€ the washer + 0.90€ with detergent.
Washers 10kg: 4.90€ the washer + 1.50€ with detergent.
Dryers 14kg: 0.40€ for 5min of dryer usage.

modal.finished: This machine is finished. If you started it, you can get back your laundry.
modal.ready: This machine is empty and ready to use.
modal.runningNotStarted: This machine is ready but not started. Please make sure you pressed the start button.
modal.broken: This machine is out of order and cannot be used. Thank you for your comprehension.
modal.error: There has been an error and we are unable to get information from this machine. Sorry for the inconvenience.
modal.unknown: This machine is in an unknown state. Sorry for the inconvenience.
modal.notificationErrorDescription: Impossible to create notifications. Please make sure you enabled notifications then restart the app.

notifications.machineFinishedBody: The machine n°{{number}} is finished and your laundry is ready to pickup
notifications.machineRunningBody: The machine n°{{number}} is still running

mascotDialog.title: Small tips
mascotDialog.message:
No need for queues anymore, you will be notified when machines are ready !

If you have your head in the clouds, you can turn on notifications for your machine by clicking on it.

If you live off campus we have other laundromat available, check the settings !!!!

mascotDialog.title: Welcome, you!
mascotDialog.message:
Login to your Amicale account to get access to more services!

You will still be able to login later.

planning.title: Events
planning.invalidEvent: Could not find the event. Please make sure the event you are trying to access is valid.

mascotDialog.title: Let's party!
mascotDialog.message:
And even more! Here you will find every event on the campus.

From pancake sales, to the Gala, you will never miss anything!

planex.title: Planex
planex.noGroupSelected: No group selected. Please select your group using the big beautiful red button bellow.

empty.title: No favorites
empty.subtitle: Clic on the star next to a group to add it to the favorites

mascotDialog.title: Don't skip class
mascotDialog.message:
Here is Planex! You can set your class and your crush's to favorites in order to find them back easily!

If you mainly use Campus for Planex, go to the settings to make the app directly start on it!

amicaleAbout.title: A question ?
amicaleAbout.subtitle: Ask the Amicale
amicaleAbout.message:
You want to revive a club?
You want to start a new project?
Here are al the contacts you need! Do not hesitate to write a mail or send a message to the Amicale's Facebook page!

proximo.title: Proximo
proximo.description: The Proximo is your small grocery store maintained by students directly on the campus. Open every day from 18h30 to 19h30, we welcome you when you are short on pastas or sodas ! Different products for different problems, everything at cost price. You can pay by Lydia or cash.

mascotDialog.title: An account?
mascotDialog.message:
An Amicale account allows you to take part in several activities around campus. You can join a club, or even create your own!

Logging into your Amicale account on the app will allow you to see all available clubs on the campus, vote for the upcoming elections, and more to come!

No Account? Go to the Amicale's building during open hours to create one.

profile.title: Profile
profile.clubsSubtitle: Click on a club to show its information
profile.membershipSubtitle: Allows you to take part in various activities
profile.welcomeDescription: This is your Amicale INSA Toulouse personal space. Bellow are the current services you can access thanks to your account. Feels empty? You're right and we plan on fixing that, so stay tuned!
profile.welcomeFeedback: We plan on doing more! If you have any suggestions or found bugs, please tell us by clicking the button bellow.

clubs.title: Clubs
clubs.managersSubtitle: These people make the club live
clubs.categoriesFilterMessage: Click on a category to filter the list
clubs.invalidClub: Could not find the club. Please make sure the club you are trying to access is valid.

about.text: The clubs, making the campus live, with more than sixty clubs offering various activities! From the philosophy club to the PABI (Production Artisanale de Bière Insaienne), without forgetting the multiple music and dance clubs, you will surely find an activity that suits you!
about.title: A question ?
about.subtitle: Ask the Amicale
about.message:
You have a question concerning the clubs?
You want to revive or create a club?
Contact the Amicale at the following address:

select.title: Elections open
select.subtitle: Vote now!
select.dialogMessage: Are you sure you want to send your vote? You will not be able to change it.

mascotDialog.title: Why vote?
mascotDialog.message:
The Amicale's elections is the right moment for you to choose the next team, which will handle different projects on the campus, help organizing your favorite events, animate the campus life during the whole year, and relay your ideas to the administration, so that your campus life is the most enjoyable possible!
Your turn to make a change!😉

Note: If there is only one list, it is still important to vote to show your support, so that the administration knows the current list is supported by students. It is always a plus when taking difficult decisions! 😉

equipment.title: Equipment Booking
equipment.booking: Click on the calendar to set the start and end dates
equipment.dialogMessage:
Are you sure you want to confirm your booking?

You will then be able to claim the selected equipment at the Amicale for the duration of your booking in exchange of a bail.
equipment.bookingConfirmedMessage: Do not forget to come by the Amicale to give your bail in exchange of the equipment.

mascotDialog.title: How does it work ?
mascotDialog.message: Thanks to the Amicale, students have access to some equipment like BBQs and others. To book one of those items, click the equipment of your choice in the list bellow, enter your lend dates, then come around the Amicale to claim it and give your bail.

permissions.error:
Scanotron 3000 needs access to the camera in order to scan QR codes.
The camera will never be used for any other purpose.

error.title: QR code invalid
error.message: The QR code scanned could not be recognised, please make sure it is valid.

mascotDialog.title: Scano...what?
mascotDialog.message:
Scanotron 3000 allows you to scan Campus QR codes, created by clubs or event managers, to get more detailed info!

The camera will never be used for any other purposes.

settings.title: Settings
settings.nightModeAutoSub: Follows the mode chosen by your system
settings.startScreenSub: Select which screen to start the app on
settings.dashboardSub: Edit what services to display on the dashboard

dashboardEdit.title: Edit dashboard
dashboardEdit.message:
The five items above represent your dashboard.
You can replace one of its services by selecting it, and then by clicking on the desired new service in the list bellow.

about.title: About
about.buttonDesc: Information about the app and its creator

user.arnaud: Student in 4IR (2020). He is the creator of this app you use everyday.
user.docjyj: Student in 2MIC FAS (2020). He added some new features and fixed some bugs.
user.yohan: Student in 4IR (2020). He helped to fix bugs and gave some ideas.
user.beranger: Student in 4AE (2020) and president of the Amicale when the app was created. The app was his idea. He helped a lot to find bugs, new features and communication.
user.celine: Student in 4GPE (2020). Without her, everything would be less cute. She helped to write the text, for communication, and also to create the mascot 🦊.
user.damien: Student in 4IR (2020) and creator of the 2020 version of the Amicale's website. Thanks to his help, integrating Amicale's services into the app was child's play.
user.titouan: Student in 4IR (2020). He helped a lot in finding bugs and new features.
user.theo: Student in 4AE (2020). If the app works on iOS, this is all thanks to his help during his numerous tests.

feedback.title: Contribute
feedback.feedbackDescription:
Feedback or bugs, you are always welcome.

feedback.contributeDescription:
Everyone can help: communication, design or coding! You are free to contribute as you like.
You can find bellow a link to Trello for project organization, and a link to the source code on GitEtud.

game.title: So Awesome Game

Stuck on the toilet? The teacher is late?
This game is for you!

Try to get the best score and beat your friends.

restart.confirm: Are you sure you want to restart?

mascotDialog.title: A secret!
mascotDialog.message: You found the secret game, awesome ! If you have time to lose, this game is for you.
